meta.name: Automatic Workflow Error Notifications via Gmail

parameters.content:
## Setup (read me)
1) Open the Gmail node and connect credentials.
2) Set the **To** field to your email or team list.
3) Save this workflow, then in each target workflow go to **Options → Settings → Error workflow** and select this.

### About the payload
This uses Error Trigger fields:
- `{{$json["workflow"]["name"]}}` / `{{$json["workflow"]["id"]}}`
- `{{$json["execution"]["id"] || "N/A"}}`
- `{{$json["execution"]["url"] || "N/A"}}`
- `{{$json["execution"]["lastNodeExecuted"] || "N/A"}}`
- `{{$json["execution"]["error"]["message"]}}`

For trigger-time failures, execution fields may be missing—email still sends with fallbacks.
